name: OR_LNLG_LASER_PRV_MNT_ACT
description: This table contains if the preventative maintenance is current for the laser safety checklist.

columns.name: LASER_SAFETY_CHECKLIST_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LSC_PREV_MAINTENANCE_ACTIVE_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores whether the preventative maintenance is current during the laser safety evaluation.
